SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Part I, Line 2 - Procedures for Monitoring the Use of Grant Funds The Organization has established procedures in place to substantiate the amounts of the grants, the grantee's eligibility for the grants, and the selection criteria used to award the grants in order to monitor the use of grant funds.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Advisors Charitable Gift Fund uses Northeast Retirement Services to provide management services including the top management and financial officers. The officers are paid by NRS and the amount of compensation allocated to ACGF is undeterminable.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization's Chief Financial Officer reviews and signs the Form 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Compliance with the Organization's conflict of interest policy is reviewed by management on a regular and consistent basis

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization's top Management Official and other officers are not compensated by the Organization.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: No documents available to the public.
